lines.content: * Duke is a personal assistant that keep a list of your tasks. Users
* are able to add different types of tasks to their own list as well as
* mark tasks as completed or delete tasks from their task list.
Command c = this.parser.parse(command, this.tdl, this.ui, this, this.storage);
* DukeException is an Exception to be thrown when functionalities of the chat bot fails.
* @param message Message that informs users about their errors.
* Parser is a class that encapsulates the behaviour of an interpreter for commands.
* Returns the appropriate command to be executed after interpreting the user's inputted command.
* @param command Input commands from the user.
* @param tdl The ToDoList used by the chat bot to track tasks.
* @param ui The user interface that the chat bot uses.
* @param chatBot The instance of the chat bot itself.
* @param storage The Storage that the chat bot uses.
* @return The type of Command to be executed.
protected Command parse(String command, ToDoList tdl, Ui ui, Duke chatBot, Storage storage) {
return new ByeCommand(chatBot, ui, tdl, storage);

throw new DukeException("Hey hey hey, the format is done <index>");
throw new DukeException("Hey hey hey, the format is delete <index>");

* The Storage class encapsulates the attributes and behaviours of a dynamic storage used by the chat bot.
* Creates an instance of the Storage class.
* @param tdl The ToDoList that will either be saving its contents onto memory or have its content loaded

* If not, creates one of such for the user.

* Loads content from memory (if any) into the current instance of ToDoList.

* The ToDoList is a class that encapsulates the attributes and behaviours of a list of things to do.
* @param name This is the name of the chat bot.
* Displays the content in ToDoList as a numbered list.
* Marks the item at index num on the ToDoList as done.
* @param num The index of the item that is to be marked as done.
System.out.println("Good! Good! Took you long enough to complete this:");

System.out.println("Now you have " + this.totalNumber.toString() + " in the list. Wew.....");

* ByeCommand is a Command that encapsulates the attributes and behaviour of a command to stop.

* Command is an abstract class that encapsulates the behaviour of the ability to do something.
* Confused command is a Command that encapsulates the attributes and behaviour of someone confused.
* @param ui Instance of User Interface in used.
